mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select distinct dongName, dongCode from houseinfo where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select d.no, h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, replace(d.dealAmount, ' ', '') as recentPrice, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, h.img from housedeal d left join houseinfo h on d.aptCode = h.aptCode left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where dongCode = #{dong} order by d.no

select d.no, h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, replace(d.dealAmount, ' ', '') as recentPrice, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, h.img from housedeal d left join houseinfo h on d.aptCode = h.aptCode left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where d.no = #{no}
